song_name: Jungle Hijinxs - Donkey Kong Country Returns

key_conclusion:
Jungle Hijinxs - Donkey Kong Country Returns is written in the key of A Dorian.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the 3rd most popular key among Dorian keys and     the 32nd most popular  among all keys.
